definition: manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: To establish the method for quality control of Ciwujia soft capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立刺五加軟膠囊的質量控制方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the tissue characteristics of radix and rhizome of Acanthopanax senticosus(Rupr et Maxim) Harms in Heilongjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黑龍江省刺五加根及根莖的組織特徵。

sentences.english: It also features Korean ginseng and eleuthero for additional herbal energy support.
sentences.chinese: 同時也含有高麗蔘和刺五加帶來額外草本能量補充。

sentences.english: Results The total flavonoids contents of Acanthopanax senticosus extract and injection were similar.
sentences.chinese: 結果刺五加提取物與刺五加註射液的總黃酮含量相近。

sentences.english: Object To study microcosmic mechanism about microwave-assisted extraction (MAE) to Radix Puerariae (RP) and Radix Caulis Acanthopanacis Senticosi (RCAS).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微波輔助萃取葛根和刺五加的微觀機制。

sentences.english: The correct Chinese name is ci wu jia.
sentences.chinese: 正確的中文名稱是刺五加。

definition: huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides)/Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)
